features: TRAVEL-FRIENDLY: The Portable Baby Stroller is designed w/ spacious and comfortable seating for your baby. Easy to fit in small spaces of cars, vans or air travel. The stroller will make your baby feel comfortable w/ its leg rest and reclining seat

FOOT-ACTIVATED BRAKE: The black and red collapsible umbrella stroller is equipped w/ foot activated parking brake allowing you to gain full control and ensuring your child’s safety when in full stop and locking front wheels for straight strolling

ACCESSIBLE BOTTOM STORAGE: Features engineered aluminum frame construction which ensures durability of the stroller w/ maximum weight capacity of 35 lbs. Also features a big storage tray basket under the stroller and a free carry bag for easy storage

ADJUSTABLE SEAT: This compact and lightweight foldable travel carriage stroller system features an adjustable seat that can be securely propped up for sitting or laid flat to use it as a bassinet style pusher so your infant can sit up or lay down

RETRACTABLE CANOPY: Features retractable canopy cover visor to protect your child from the scorching heat of the sun. Features one-hand folding operation for quick setup and reliable 5-point safety harness. Convenient for children up to 3 years old

Easy 1 Hand Foldable Compact Stroller, Adjustable Reclining Seat, World's Smallest Stroller to Fit in Small Cars Between The Seats by Jovial.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: One of the best Convenience Stroller Our innovative air-light aluminum frame lightweight to carry and push with high tech material for the best comfort for you child ,We also Feature a big storage Space under the stroller and a free carry bag for easy travel. Designed with our team for lightweight strollers for baby travel with small spaces in mind for cars vans & air travel. Upgraded Portable Lightweight Travel Stroller Portable Stroller for travel This Portable Stroller lets you unfold adventure with your little one. Designed to make it easy for you to get out and is compact enough for you to go anywhere! The stroller includes a travel bag that makes it easy to stow away on a plane or car. The easy open mechanism is a quick way to get things rolling while one hand steering makes maneuvering through the city a breeze. Compact, Lightweight & Folding Design Spacious & Comfortable Seating Reclining Baby Seat & Leg Rest Adjustments Allow your Infant to Sit-up or Lay Down Near Flat Lay for Bassinet-Style Care Retractable Canopy Sun Visor Accessible Bottom Storage Tray Basket One-Hand Folding Operation for Quick Setup

Features Five point harness To keep your baby more safety. Extra Slim Foldable Design The stroller includes a travel bag that makes it easy to stow away on a plane, train, or car. Adjustable canopy High quality catatonic fabric material of canopy with different adjustable position.

Removable handle bar Removable handrail design that easy to put in or hold your baby out. Double brake This Portable Stroller has double brake rear wheel by feet. One hand folding button Easy to collapse the stroller in seconds by one hand. Foot Break Foot active parking brake, you don't need to worry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We are very surprised with this stroller! I did a lot of research comparing strollers and making sure it had all the specs but at an affordable price. It definitely is compact (will update after our trip to confirm it fits in overhead bin), the back is very sturdy to either sit up or lay child down at different settings, rolls nice, and my favorite part was getting to put our car seat on it as well for easy transportation. Everything came in pristine condition, the bar that attaches to the seat is easy to release, also stays on and swings up and over for easy access. I will give an update after our trip to see if it held up - pros & cons!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Indeed lightweight and foldable
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is a great lightweight option. It folds down fairly small and has a nice rolling option (like a suitcase). We’ve used it for flying also. For bigger planes, it actually fits in overhead storage. Not the case for smaller ones.Downsides are the storage underneath is small (can’t quit fit our diaper bag) and there are no cup holders for kiddo or parents. We got a generic pocket thing to hang for us. So we put our drinks and keys etc in that.Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well thought out functional compact stroller!
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is the nicest compact stroller I could imagine. Other compact stroller boasted their sizes however you have to give up something for that. Not with this stroller. It still has a large sun visor that covers the entire seat. It also has 360 wheels in the front to make maneuvering that much easier. It reclines!! Which is something not many others did!! I love that the 5 point harness has lite padding so it's not just an uncomfortable strap on the little one. It also has a small storage bin on the bottom. I also love the design, its sleek and simple.Just a couple of things I've noticed since we got it. It folds down to a great size however it may still be just a bit large to fit in the overhead bin. I have a trip in 2 weeks and will try it out then. Also I need to practice the opening a bit to get into a good rhythm with it. It opens with one hand with the exception of undoing the clip that prevents it from falling open on its own. But with some practice I see this becoming really simple. Overall this is a great stroller and I'm really looking forward to traveling with it and little one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not that easy
reviews.reviewText: It’s not that easy to quickly fold down. The bar needs to be removed to fit in the carry bag, and it would fit easier if front wheels were removed too. Airline made us gate check this item both ways. Too large for the overhead, esp on a full flight. The carry bag zipper broke almost immediately. I can’t seem to find a replacement. It seems to ride nicely and I like that the back has different positions. Lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use and lightweight!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my new granddaughter because my son and his wife were e battling a big heavy stroller every time they went out of the house ! They are very happy with this stroller, and it has made their life easier! Highly recommend to new parents! Also was a fair price and quick shipping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I bought this stroller because we are going on vacation to Mexico in a few months and I realized that I'll need to bring a stroller with us since it'll be WAY too hot to have to carry my infant around everywhere (plus it will make my life easier in the airports as well). My baby will be just 5 months old by the time we travel so I was looking for something that folds really small, is lightweight, not super expensive, and reclines almost flat since the baby wont totally be able to support himself yet. This stroller is almost perfect! In fact, if you use an infant support pillow like I show in the pictures, you can even put a newborn in there safely/comfortably. For reference, my baby is 3 weeks old in the pictures included. The sun visor is nice and big so it provides pretty good coverage, especially when the seat is fully reclined. The basket underneath is very small and there is no cupholder but you can find attachments or accessories if necessary. Some reviews said this stroller is hard to fold/unfold- I completely DISAGREE. Its very smooth and easy to fold or unfold and you do it with one hand. The brake is a one foot brake so thats super convenient too. And one of the best features is the adjustable foot rest. I fold it upright so my baby cant slide down when he's not buckled. Overall this stroller was a great buy and I recommend it to anyone in need of a small-folding option. The only partially negative things I have to agree with others on is that it doesnt seem small enough to fit in an overhead bin on a plane...its a little too big I think but I'll confirm after our trip! So far Im SO glad I purchased this! Well worth the price!

I recently purchased the Jovial JPC20BK Portable Folding Lightweight Baby Stroller and I am thoroughly impressed with its design and functionality. The stroller is incredibly compact and lightweight, making it perfect for traveling with a baby. It folds up easily and takes up very little space, making it easy to store and transport.The 5-point safety harness provides added security for my little one, and the canopy sun shade is a great feature for sunny days. I love that I can easily adjust the shade to protect my baby from the sun. The stroller is also very easy to maneuver and the one-hand fold makes it easy to use while holding my baby.Overall, I am extremely happy with my purchase of the Jovial JPC20BK Portable Folding Lightweight Baby Stroller. It has exceeded my expectations and I would highly recommend it to any parent in need of a compact and easy-to-use stroller for traveling or everyday use.

Me encantó, super fácil de abrir y cerrar (con una sola mano) se hace super chiquita y es ligera.Fuimos de viaje y nos sirvió muchísimo en aeropuerto, ciudad, parque, etc. las llantas funcionan muy bien. super recomendable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Extremely easy-to-use and has so many great features!
reviews.reviewText: This travel stroller is lightweight and so easy to both collapse and set-up. Shipping was fast and the stroller itself came packed in a great storage bag. It has so many features that you would normally see in a much more expensive non-compact stroller. Features like: one handed collapse and set-up, longer leg rest that has the ability to rise and lower, ability to fully recline to near lying down position, large canopy for better coverage, under stroller storage basket, swivel crossbar, and either push it around like a suitcase or carry using its convenient carrying strap. Great purchase for an even better price!

Overall satisfied with the product so far!Pros:- Very light and compact, can be pulled like a suitcase.- The frame is sturdy and has a nice black finish. The material seems to be of good quality.- Wheels are smooth and silent so far.- Everything works as expected so far.- Has the essentials (storage, brake, canopy).- Reclines more than many budget compact strollers.Cons:Not many, just little details that come with the low price.- Unfolding usually requires both hands, I find the fold lock annoying.- Canvas material does not look very breathable and is a bit rough.- Harness always opens into 5 straps, which is not as practical for buckling up the child, and the shoulder pad usually comes off its position.- Still exceeds the dimensions for a carry-on suitcase for Air Canada. We'll see how it goes when we fly.

I have not travelled with the stroller yet, which was our reason for buying it. But when it arrived it seems like it will be good for what we need. It is easy to fold and unfold and the seat comes with several reclining options as well as the foot rest can go up and down for comfort. The basket underneath seems large and it’s easy to maneuver. It is a little bit bigger than I anticipated when it’s folded up, so I do not think it would fit in an airplane overhead cabinet bin which is what I was hoping for. That being said the travel bag it comes with is handy and it will still be a good size for putting in and out of the trunk of our rental car.
